definitions.definition: One of a series of berths or beds placed in tiers.
examples: Jane sleeps in the top bunk , and her little sister Lauren takes the bottom bunk .

definitions.definition: ( nautical ) A built-in bed on board ship , often erected in tiers one above the other.
( US ) A wooden case or box, which serves for a seat in the daytime and for a bed at night.
( US , dialect ) A piece of wood placed on a lumberman 's sled to sustain the end of heavy timbers .
( Singapore , military , by extension ) A dormitory where soldiers sleep.

main_definition: One of a series of berths or beds placed in tiers.
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) A built-in bed on board ship , often erected in tiers one above the other.
( US ) A wooden case or box, which serves for a seat in the daytime and for a bed at night.
( US , dialect ) A piece of wood placed on a lumberman 's sled to sustain the end of heavy timbers .
( Singapore , military , by extension ) A dormitory where soldiers sleep.

examples: What she said about me was total bunk . Don't believe a word.

definitions.definition: In early use often in the form the bunk .
A specimen of a recreational drug with insufficient active ingredient .

secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) In early use often in the form the bunk . [1900-1927]
( slang ) A specimen of a recreational drug with insufficient active ingredient .
